name: spo-enable-disable-app-bar
title: Enable and Disable App Bar in SharePoint Online
shortDescription: This script sample demonstrates how to enable and disable the App Bar on SharePoint online sites by utilizing PnP PowerShell and SPO Management Shell.
longDescription: This script helps SharePoint Users to Enable or Disable App Bar Across SharePoint sites

thumbnails.alt: Enable and Disable App Bar in SharePoint Online

references.name: Want to learn more about PnP PowerShell and the cmdlets
references.description: Check out the PnP PowerShell site to get started and for the reference to the cmdlets.

references.name: Introduction to the SharePoint Online Management Shell
references.description: Check out the SPO Management Shell documentation site to get started and for the reference to the cmdlets.
